Let's get started. Sign up with your email address to work with us & for more details.



Online Counselling

Numerous phobias and mental health issues may prevent clients from travelling or spending time in new environments.Your online mental wellbeing community, Free, safe and anonymous support.

Free youth Counselling

Everyone feels down sometimes, but talking can really help. If you are aged 12-25, live in Birmingham and registered with a Birmingham GP, then Open Door can offer you a free counselling service.

Couple Counselling

Couples counselling is for individuals and couples who need to make changes in their present situation. Distress may be caused by growing conflict, difficulty with acknowledging or expressing feelings, sexual problems or a range of other factors.
